projects.name: FireSlinger
projects.description: FireSlinger is a sidescrolling 2D shooter prototype created for my team's senior project. The demo has two singleplayer levels available as well as a local multiplayer mode. Keyboard and Gamepad controls supported.

projects.name: TrackDota
projects.description: An Android app to get live updates and keep track of professional Dota 2 matches as they happen. Get tons of info, from each players individual stats to their item builds and more

projects.name: React Cart
projects.description: A simple responsive single-page shopping cart/product page made with React.js

projects.name: Node System
projects.description: Multithreaded Java Client/Server using a shared data structure concurrently. The system can register many clients simultaneously and can be extended for a variety of web applications, from user databases to chat programs and more
